This sample is a phase 2/phase 3 trial for colorectal cancer, testing the drugs cediranib, bevacizumab, 5-fluorouracil, leucovorin, and oxaliplatin, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with unresectable stage IV melanoma, testing the drug temozolomide, with specific eligibility criteria including disease characteristics, patient characteristics, and prior concurrent therapy.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with epithelial ovarian cancer, testing the combination of mk-1775 and carboplatin as a treatment option. This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with endometrial cancer, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin, cisplatin, and paclitaxel as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria for patient inclusion.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with esophageal adenocarcinoma and gastric adenocarcinoma, testing the effectiveness of panitumumab, epirubicin, oxaliplatin, and xeloda as a treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with head and neck cancer, testing the drug tas-106. The inclusion criteria include age, confirmed diagnosis, prior treatment, and measurable disease, while exclusion criteria include brain involvement, peripheral neuropathy, and history of another malignancy.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with pancreatic cancer, testing the effectiveness of fluorouracil, gemcitabine hydrochloride, and oxaliplatin as treatment options. The eligibility criteria include specific disease characteristics, performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, and exclusion of certain medical conditions. Prior chemotherapy or radiotherapy for pancreatic cancer is not allowed, and concurrent major surgical procedures are not anticipated. Concurrent use of certain medications and investigational agents is also not allowed.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for lapatinib and capecitabine in patients with metastatic breast cancer, with specific eligibility criteria including documented progressive advanced or metastatic breast cancer, prior treatment with taxane and anthracycline regimens, and ErbB2 overexpression.

This phase 2 trial is testing the drug eribulin mesylate for patients with locally advanced or metastatic pancreatic cancer who have received prior gemcitabine-based therapy, and have certain eligibility criteria including measurable disease, age over 18, and adequate organ function.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for the treatment of postherpetic neuralgia, a persistent neuropathic pain condition, using the drugs xpf-002 and placebo, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with potentially resectable esophageal cancer, testing the effectiveness of carboplatin, celecoxib, and paclitaxel as treatment options, with specific eligibility criteria outlined.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for ambulant female patients with metastatic breast cancer who have been previously treated with an anthracycline and a taxane. The inclusion criteria include histologically or cytologically confirmed breast cancer with at least one measurable metastatic lesion, prior treatment with an anthracycline and a taxane, and a Karnofsky performance status of >= 70%. The exclusion criteria include previous extensive chemotherapy regimens, untreated brain metastases, and certain laboratory abnormalities.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with recurrent or persistent ovarian or peritoneal cancer, testing the drug pemetrexed. The inclusion criteria include histologically confirmed disease, measurable disease, and prior platinum-based chemotherapy, while exclusion criteria include prior therapy with pemetrexed and history of other invasive malignancies.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for osteoporosis, testing the drugs placebo and dp001 on postmenopausal females with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for rheumatoid arthritis, testing the drugs ccx-354-c and placebo, with eligibility criteria including active RA, specific joint counts, and stable doses of methotrexate and other medications.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for the treatment of chronic hepatitis C, using the drugs daclatasvir and placebo, with key inclusion criteria including being chronically infected with hepatitis C virus genotype 1 and having a BMI of 18 to 35 kg/m².

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD) patients, testing the efficacy of drugs rv568 and placebo in improving lung function, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participant eligibility.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with metastatic or recurrent gastric cancer, testing the drugs taxol and campt, topotesin, with eligibility criteria including prior treatment for advanced disease, measurable lesions, specific hematologic values, and normal ECG.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for advanced, surgically unresectable colorectal cancer (CRC) patients, testing the efficacy of bevacizumab, capecitabine, and oxaliplatin as a chemotherapy regimen, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria.

This phase 2 trial is testing the efficacy of imatinib mesylate and paclitaxel in treating non-small cell lung cancer patients aged 70 or older, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria related to disease stage, hepatic and renal function, performance status, and reproductive potential.

This phase 2 trial is investigating the efficacy of mk-0873 and usual care in treating patients with lung diseases, specifically chronic obstructive pulmonary disease (COPD), and the eligibility criteria include age range, lung function tests, and exclusion of severe medical conditions, continuous oxygen therapy, cardiac arrhythmias, other lung diseases, and history of colitis.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for smoking cessation, testing the drugs evt 302, placebo, evt 302 plus open label nicotine replacement, and placebo plus open label nicotine replacement, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for participants.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with heart failure, testing the drug cxl-1020 and its various doses, along with a placebo, to evaluate its efficacy and safety in improving left ventricular ejection fraction and reducing heart failure symptoms.
This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with asthma, testing the efficacy of tiotropium bromide at different doses, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This phase 2 trial aims to evaluate the efficacy of warfarin and placebo in treating pulmonary hypertension in patients with sickle cell anemia or sickle cell beta zero thalassemia, who have evidence of persistent elevation of pulmonary artery systolic pressure but no evidence of moderate or severe diastolic dysfunction.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 clinical trial for adult patients with various types of brain tumors, including glioblastoma and meningioma, using erlotinib hydrochloride as the drug, with specific eligibility criteria and required medical tests.

The eligibility criteria include being at least 18 years old, HIV positive, and having no active heart disease. Exclusion criteria include pregnancy or breastfeeding, unwillingness to use birth control, recent use of investigational drugs or vaccines, and substance abuse.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial that aims to evaluate the effectiveness of gemcitabine hydrochloride, carboplatin, and dexamethasone in treating various types of relapsed or refractory lymphoid malignancies, including B-cell, T-cell, and Hodgkin's Disease. The study includes patients with measurable disease, specific performance status, and certain laboratory values, while excluding patients with HIV, active hepatitis B virus infection, or other medical conditions that would contraindicate aggressive chemotherapy.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with small cell lung cancer, testing the drug pemetrexed, and includes eligibility criteria such as prior chemotherapy regimens and completion of radiation therapy.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer, testing the effectiveness of erlotinib and gemcitabine as treatment options, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for patients with recurrent or stage III non-small cell lung cancer, testing the drugs bortezomib, paclitaxel, and carboplatin, with eligibility criteria including specific disease stage, performance status, blood counts, liver and kidney function, heart health, lung function, and exclusion of other severe diseases or infections.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with inoperable, locally advanced, or metastatic colorectal cancer, testing the combination of s-1 and bevacizumab as a treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria including age, disease stage, previous treatment, and organ function requirements.

This sample is a phase 1/phase 2 trial for the treatment of age-related macular degeneration and choroidal neovascularization using the drugs ibi-20089 and lucentis, with specific eligibility criteria for subjects aged 55 and older.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for participants with refractory or relapsed acute myelogenous leukemia (AML) or untreated AML, testing the drug ly2090314, with specific eligibility criteria including organ function, performance status, previous therapies, and contraceptive precautions.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for ulcerative colitis, testing the drugs hmpl-004 low dose, placebo, and hmpl-004 high dose, with inclusion criteria of having active confirmed mild to moderate ulcerative colitis and exclusion criteria of being diagnosed with Crohn's Disease.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with metastatic prostate cancer, testing the effectiveness of the drugs mitoxantrone, prednisone, and sorafenib, with specific eligibility criteria for patient inclusion.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with recurrent epithelial ovarian or primary peritoneal carcinoma, testing the drug Abraxane, with specific eligibility criteria including disease stage, prior treatment, blood counts, and blood chemistry levels.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with soft tissue sarcoma, testing the drug glufosfamide as a potential treatment option, with specific eligibility criteria and exclusion criteria outlined.

This study is testing the effectiveness of d-methadone and placebo in treating chronic pain in patients with various types of cancer, with specific inclusion and exclusion criteria for each phase of the trial.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for rheumatoid arthritis (RA) patients who have failed nonbiologic DMARD treatment, and it aims to evaluate the efficacy of the drug vx-509 compared to placebo in reducing disease symptoms.
This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for pancreatic cancer, testing the drugs rp101 and gemcitabine, with specific eligibility criteria for subjects to be included or excluded from the study.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for prostate cancer patients who have been treated with Zoladex and bicalutamide, and are experiencing rising PSA levels. The trial aims to test the effectiveness of escalating doses of casodex in these patients.

This sample is a phase 2 trial testing the drugs imatinib mesylate and paclitaxel for the treatment of various stages of non-small cell lung cancer, with specific eligibility criteria including histologic diagnosis, measurable disease, and certain laboratory values, while excluding patients with brain metastasis, prior chemotherapy, or other significant malignancies.

This sample is a phase 2 trial for patients with myelodysplastic syndromes, testing the effectiveness of azacitidine, erythropoietin, and azacitidine (monotherapy) in treating anemia in patients with MDS.

The exclusion criteria include no evidence of PSA progression, prior chemotherapy or treatment with Vidaza, hypersensitivity to Vidaza, certain heart conditions, concurrent immunotherapy or bisphosphonate therapy, recent treatment with radiation therapy or other agents, CNS involvement, uncontrolled medical or psychiatric illness, and positive for HIV, hepatitis B, or hepatitis C.

This sample is a phase 2 clinical trial for patients with primary malignant glioma, specifically glioblastoma multiforme, gliosarcoma, anaplastic astrocytoma, or anaplastic oligodendroglioma, who are either chemotherapy naïve or non-naïve and scheduled to receive Irinotecan/Bevacizumab chemotherapy.
